content: Home - Prof. Dr. Bela Gipp, University of Göttingen, GippLab Skip to content Homewp-admin2024-01-13T16:33:02+01:00 Chair for Scientific Information Analytics Prof. Bela Gipp Welcome to the Chair for Scientific Information Analytics. On this page, you will find information about the members of this research group, ongoing research projects, offered courses, topics for Bachelor’s and Master’s projects and open positions. Our interdisciplinary research covers the fields of: Machine Learning & Data Science Information Science Distributed Ledger Technology Natural Language Processing Information Retrieval, Analysis &
